name: Shrimp and Avocado Sandwiches
description: Avocados are a great source of oleic acid, a monounsaturated fat, important for heart health. They are higher in fat than other fruits, so enjoy in moderation.

ingredients.name: whole-grain bread

preparation: Gently fold shrimp and pepper into Guacamole Dip.
tips: Serve with a vegetable platter and prepared Epicure Dip.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!
